name: Pranesh Kumar Rajasekar
company_address: 233, Arumuga Achari Street, Near Bus stand, Dharmapuri, Tamilnadu, 636701
top_product: • Custom & Handmade Jewellery : Bespoke rings, earrings, and pendants. • Readymade Collections: 22K,18K designer gold jewellery and 92.5 Sterling silver jewellery and articles. • Signature Creations: Wedding and engagement rings, graduation pieces, and the Point of Light Necklace, our best-selling gift. • Brand Jewellery: We tansform your logo or brand into an exclusive jewellery piece. • Materials : Any precious or semi-precious stones and lab-grown diamonds can be availed too. • Restoration : Remakes, and Remodels of heirloom pieces.
ideal_referral: - Brides, grooms, and families preparing for engagements, weddings, anniversaries, or milestone celebrations. - Women who appreciate style, luxury, and self-expression through fine jewellery. - Men looking for elegant gifts such as engagement rings, customised pieces, or luxury accessories. - Clients wanting to repurpose or redesign old gold or heirloom jewellery into modern creations by restoration techniques. - Corporate clients or personal shoppers seeking meaningful gifts for employees, clients, or loved ones. - Collectors and connoisseurs of gemstones and bespoke jewellery. - Wedding planners, beauty salons, boutiques, hotels, and corporate gifting companies who cater to clients celebrating milestones
top_problem_solved: We help clients revive the emotional and financial value of their jewellery by remodelling old or damaged pieces into stunning, wearable designs. Family heirlooms are restored, redesigned, and preserved for the next generation. Turned our client’s mom’s Mangalsutra into bespoke rings, used hairs from dog to make it into a pendant as a memoir. We also do last minute gift emergencies discreetly helping clients choose the perfect piece that truly delights their loved ones.
my_favourite_bni_story: - A client brought her late mother’s mangalsutra, wanting it transformed into a ring. While others refused, we made it happen with her wishes at heart. Now, she wears it every day in loving memory of her mother. - Another client came to me heartbroken after losing her dog. She brought his hair and nails, asking me to turn them into a pendant so she could keep him close. When she saw it, she cried — happy tears this time. It reminded me how powerful our work can be when it carries love and memory.

name: Srikanth Govindarajan
company_address: No 1 vattara valarchi colony,, near ulavar sandhai,, DHARMAPURI, Tamil Nadu, 636701
my_business: We started our journey in Dharmapuri by 1967 to fulfill the requirements of the farmers by bringing the oil engines used for pumping water from openwells for their irrigation purpose, later when farmers got access to electricity we brought to their doorstep TEXMO brand's monoblock motors which was a huge success for us, from that time we started to serve for farmers by keeping their knowledge updated on motors and other products. We have fulfilled more than 90% of agricultural pump needs in and around Dharmapuri, Krishnagiri and Harur. We have extended our pumps in a wide range used for industrial and domestic needs.
top_product: Building solutions motors and pumps
ideal_referral: Construction engineers, Plumbing engineers, Contractors and Mines Quarry owners
top_problem_solved: Implementation of water transfer from river to a small village about 8 km from river near rayakottai
my_favourite_bni_story: In BNI, understanding and supporting fellow members is key to success. Sadhasivam, a member of my chapter, faced a major challenge with his hotel’s drainage tank, which required manual emptying every hour—an inefficient and exhausting task. After understanding his needs, I provided a drainage dewatering pump with an automatic option that resolved the issue seamlessly. This solution not only saved him time and effort but also enhanced his hotel’s operational efficiency. It’s fulfilling to see how we can create impactful solutions through our BNI connections. Together, we grow and succeed!
